title: Trophy & Achievement Guide
content:
il's in the Details

Strike the last blow against Commander Zhalk in the Prologue.

She Cannot be Caged!

You Have Two Hands for a Reason

Expand Your Mind

Rude, Crude, and Full of Attitude

The scroll to summon this creature can be found inside a coffin in a hidden room at the south-west building at Blighted Village. To gain access to the secret room, you must pull a leaver hidden behind some wood boxes.

Forged in Blood and Fire

The Plot Thickens

Storyline achievement.

The Lich-Queen's Wra
